properties.description: This policy initiative deploys the diagnostic settings for Azure Services to forward diagnostic logs and metrics to an Azure Log Analytics workspace.
properties.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for Azure Services to send logs to Azure Log Analytics Workspace - Sentinel

metadata.description: Select Log Analytics workspace from dropdown list. If this workspace is outside of the scope of the assignment you must manually grant 'Log Analytics Contributor' permissions (or similar) to the policy assignment's principal ID.

metadata.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for Activity Log to Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for Key Vault to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any Key Vault which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for Firewall to Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for Firewall to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any Firewall which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for Key Vault to Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for Key Vault to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any Key Vault which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.displayName: Deploy Diagnostic Settings for SQL Databases to Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Deploys the diagnostic settings for SQL Databases to stream to a Log Analytics workspace when any SQL Databases which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated. The Policy will set the diagnostic with all metrics and category enabled

metadata.displayName: Deploy Audit Settings for Azure SQL database servers to stream Audit logs to Log Analytics workspace
metadata.description: Deploys the Audit Settings for Azure SQL database servers to stream Audit logs to a regional Log Analytics workspace when any Azure SQL Database server which is missing this diagnostic settings is created or updated.
